<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alchemical Discoveries](/Feats.aspx?ID=5946) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 108 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[alchemical sciences methodology](/Methodologies.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You've devoted extra time in the lab to improve your knowledge of alchemy. You learn the formulas for two [alchemical items](/Traits.aspx?ID=528) each time you level up instead of one; these must still be [elixirs](/Equipment.aspx?Category=6&Subcategory=8) or [tools](/Equipment.aspx?Category=6&Subcategory=10). The number of versatile vials you can create each day increases by one if you're an expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37), two if you're a master, or three if you're legendary.
